data.title: Wright Entertainment Group
data.meta_description: Wright Entertainment Group | 1,626 followers on LinkedIn. Wright Entertainment Group is an artist management company founded by legendary music manager, Johnny Wright. WEG develops and assembles aspiring musical talent and also represents a roster of veteran entertainers. Please visit www.WEGMusic.com for more information.
data.text:
LinkedIn and 3rd parties use essential and non-essential cookies to provide, secure, analyze and improve our Services, and to show you relevant ads (including professional and job ads) on and off LinkedIn. Learn more in our Cookie Policy.

Select Accept to consent or Reject to decline non-essential cookies for this use. You can update your choices at any time in your settings.
